Package com.payd.shooti.manager

Class GameTeamManager

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.manager.GameTeamManager
public class GameTeamManager extends Object
Organizes players into teams and manages team-related events. Max team count is 4.

  • Method Details

    • initClientTeam

      public void initClientTeam()
      Initializes the client player into a team if they are not already in one. Used for launches directly into a gamemode without team configuration action.

    • autoSortQueue

      public void autoSortQueue()
      Automatically sorts players into teams based on the smallest team count.
